name: MEC Roaster Mitts - Children
categories: Toddler and child gloves and mittens
description:
The perfect mitts for playing in the leaf pile on a cool autumn day. Double-fleeced for extra warmth.Made of brushed anti-pill polyester fleece, and lined with soft polyester microfleece.Elasticized cuffs for easy on-off, but cinched enough so they stay on.Slightly longer cut in the cuffs allows them to fit snugly under sleeves, without exposing skin to the elements.Care instructions: Hand wash or machine wash warm. Hang to dry. Don’t bleach, iron or dry clean.

        Sustainability
